website_summaries.verdict: This smaller set includes all of the essentials. A perfect choice for a college student or professional on their own for the first time.
pros: The handles have a solid grip and are comfortable to hold
Cleaning takes no time at all as the dishes easily wipe clean
The flat porcelain bottoms are designed to keep ceramic stove tops safe from scratches
These pans heat evenly and hold the heat well
The turquoise and black design has a modern feel and we loved the included utensils
cons: The set is not dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nonstick cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Im so pleased with this pots and pans set! I washed , dried and seasoned with oil (per manufacturers instructions) once I got them. The pots came with lids which have a venting hole in them. It makes it easy to drain grease or water from your pasta. The lid handles have a material over them that doesnt get hot . I cooked eggs this morning and was able to fry them without oil so the nonstick coating is really good! Also liked the spoons and spatulas that came with them. Great set for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not ceramic coated cookware
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set but do not purchase this if you are looking for ceramic coated cookware. This came up repeatedly in my amazon searches for ceramic coated cookware. Although it is non-stick, it is not ceramic coated and the pans are small. A good set for a college kids, a vacation condo or novice cooks. Great value, small fry pan arrived scratched sadly. Thus the 3 star rating. Feeling fairly conflicted about this purchase and would like to return it but my return window closed with no response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Landon

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect for two people
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for two people. The pans are slightly downsized from most sets (9.5" saute pan vs. 10") If I was cooking for a family, I would want a different set, but it is great for us. And, they look nice and sit nice and flat on my glass top stove. I use them daily and no warping or chipping. I do not put them in the dishwasher, but hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: W. Shattuck

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and priced unbelievably low.
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and high quality. We just bought a new electric stove with a ceramic surface top and the flat porcelain bottoms do not scratch the surface.
customer_reviews.author: OldeTyme Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Good Attractive Product
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews. My order arrived on schedule with no damage, lids all fit well. I seasoned per instructions and follow clean and care instructions. I have been using for a couple of weeks now. Cooks well, cleans easily so no issues so far. Skillets are smaller than most sets and one pan is small but still holds a can of food so it works. Would I like a larger skillet? Yes, so I use the saute pan most.
customer_reviews.author: James Barnett

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans are perfect, sturdy, and absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE these pots and pans! Not only are they beautiful, they are so easy to clean, food doesn't stick, and food cooks evenly. They are the perfect size, no different and not any smaller than other sets we've owned. The lids fit nicely and everything stores nicely, stacked one inside another.
customer_reviews.author: maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color Set cooks great!!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful I love teal and was looking for good quality pot and pan set in this color. I am so glad I purchased this set the price was great and the set is great! With this set I always hand wash everything after letting it cool down. Do not put water in pots or pans when they are hot it can damage the pans coating. It holds heat so well you never should cook over medium once given the time to heat up the pan cooks so nicely. I usually use a few drops of oil or a small pat of butter and I never have an issue with sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are so nice and colorful, easy to cook in, nothing sticks to the surface, and no scratches yet! I did order a new set of silicone utensils to prevent the pots from scratching on the inside. It does come with some utensils, but I decided they might be too stiff and scratch the linings of the pans/pots.
customer_reviews.author: dawn j orchard

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good set, but NOT Blue
customer_reviews.text: Color is NOT Blue as advertised, it’s Turquoise. One pan had a decent size scuff mark as well. Amazon’s customer representative took care of my concerns immediately. They truly are a Proactive company when it comes to Customer Service. Outside of the above aforementioned, it’s an attractive set and the pieces are smaller than typical sets, ideal for 1-2 people. I just starting using them and feel they are doing well.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Delicate but I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set! Not only is it nice looking, it’s nice to cook on/with! They are easy to clean. I follow the directions to a “T” in regards to the care of this set. The only dislike is that they are thin and I’m afraid of ruining them. I guess you can say, they’re delicate but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: RubyRed34

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on these pots and pan before purchasing. Some people posted issue with them being cracked and some loved them. . I decided to try them because I like the color. I received mine and they had no cracks or issues. They are very well made and sturdy. Love the color and style. They cook great! They clean up very easy. Good price for the set. I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth65

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my SIL and she loves them! Easy to clean and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of cookwear.When used properly, food will not stick and clean up is so very simple. I have also found hand washing better for life span than the dishwasher. Since nothing sticks anyway, hand washing is fast and not a big deal. The pans are not as heavy as I thought they would be, but perform great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set a couple months ago and I’ve been pretty happy with my purchase overall. The set is as advertised. Make sure to read the care instructions so you know how to properly care for your set to keep it in good condition for longer :)
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Enamel might not last
customer_reviews.text: The enamel on the outside is coming off already and have only owned these for a week or two sad because the pans work great I really wanted nice pans but they might not make it long that’s why the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Pixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: True to color and are non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I really like my pots and pans set. True to color and are non-stick. The only downfall is that they can't be washed in the dish washer which is kind of a hassle. Also, the bottom of the pots and pans can get discolored pretty easily. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Loving this cookware set!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean, and if the outside is dirty and doesn't want to come clean with soap and water, use a little scrub bright, it will come off with ease! The price was great for this set, especially after receiving and utilizing it. I would totally buy this set again! And again, totally one of my favorite colors!! 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my pots and pans today and already I cooked my first meal in them. They worked great. I made chicken alfredo and everything came out perfect. Didn’t need to add oil to grill chicken. I love the design. They are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again...we really like them a lot! Pretty color, durable, easy to clean...Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not much
customer_reviews.text: It's ok - but not what I was expecting. The warning that they could melt over high heat really bothered me and I've donated the set to a worthy cause.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to have the food slide out of this pans so easily. They are beautiful in color and just the right about of sizes for the cooking that I do. The price was right too
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: Great set, gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Beautiful color. I haven't had any issues with it in the month and I have I've been using them. I will say that the largest pan is a bit too small from what I'm used to, but I'm making do.
customer_reviews.author: Emilly

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love these Pans!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I Love Love Love these pans easy to clean, cooked scrambled eggs with nothing (no butter/no oil/nothing) on the pan! (First time ever in my life!) Would Highly recommend great deal for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set! Haven't used it yet, but appears to be of good quality.

customer_reviews.title: These pots in pans
customer_reviews.text: These pots in pans ya are great plain in simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upscale look, reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: These cookware pieces are perfect for our beach home! Not too big, attractive to display and comes with 4 utensils. All of this comes at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stressed-out teacher

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are the best set of pots and pans I've purchased so far. They're amazingly sturdy and very attractive. Plus, unlike other sets, they have plenty of lids! Thanks, Finnhomy.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described, they look great, and make clean-up easy. I only wish the pans were a little bigger ={

customer_reviews.title: Red cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this set for a short time but so far they are great!

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They cook evenly, food doesn’t stick at all, and they are super easy to clean. I’ve had them 2 months.

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick cookwear
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color, ceramic coating on outside. They clean like a dream, only starting to see some slight burn marks on the bottoms after a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Color is not what it says
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the color. It advertised as being blue and looked blue in the photos but the color is actually aqua in color and does not match my kitchen color theme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! They’re easy to heat and clean. And the color is very pretty.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set of cookware. I got the turquoise color and love the way it looks in my kitchen. Everything is very easy to clean, both inside and out. Nothing sticks when cooking...and I mean NOTHING!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, it cleans up easily but the rim on 1 of the skillets is chipping after only using it a few times. Think I will get in touch with the company about having it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth gayle parker

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! I've only had them long enough to cook one meal, but they heated evenly throughout and there was no sticking. Pretty happy thus far. I will update my review in a few months once I've broken them in more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set, what a bargain
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to clean, heat evenly and just read they are Ovenproof up to 350°. I love the set
customer_reviews.author: AmyY

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when I preferred because of some of the reviews but omg I am in love! They are super mom stick and so easy to wash! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ana ortiz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SET!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Beautiful finish, so easy to clean and they look amazing to boot. I've been looking for a new pots and pans set for a while now and I am completely satisfied with this purchase. You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dre Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The bigger pot came warped so the lid doesn’t fit. Also the pots were smaller then expected but I like everything else so I didn’t try to send it back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans there great ,food cooks well no sticking,easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything was nice but the largest pot had a small dent maybe from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and heats up very evenly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and heats up very evenly. The color is exactly like the picture and the inside is so smooth. I love this set!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I was literally at my door when this arrived . I’m so happy !

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great set
customer_reviews.text: Been using cookware for about 3 months now and works beautifully. Maintain as per package directions and haven’t put in dishwasher. Pans are lightweight and fit nicely on stove versus other bulky pans. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Need dishwasher safe pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we gave these to our son for Christmas and as a 28 year old male, everything goes into the dishwasher! He really liked them, but we will be returning for dishwasher safe pots and pans.

customer_reviews.title: good cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookware set recently and I liked it so much. The quality is good with attracting color. Very durable. All the pots and pans are a very good and great size.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot and pans set
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and very pretty and would higher recommend them to friends and family.

customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few days. Beautiful to look at and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice

customer_reviews.text: These were for my mom who is 83 & still cooking for herself!! Excellent choice mom!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are just lovely!! Highly suggest! True to the color and very durable : ) I would give 10 stars if that was an option.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans ! Clean up well and very sturdy !
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Newburgh

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! The color is cheery and the seem to cook everything quicker than usual. No mess and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Steph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pans for 6 months and they look brand new! I cook daily and use these pans at least twice a day and I have never had pans that hold up as well as these pans. As long as you follow the care directions they remain in perfect conditions. They clean up beautifully, cook evenly, and easy to clean. I don't usually write many reviews but I wanted anyone thinking of purchasing these pans to know that they are well worth the money. The company has done an exceptional job of manufacturing an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: rayimpala

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I expected.
customer_reviews.text: 100% love this item. It is high quality and looks great. I will absolutely order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg omg not only are they pretty but they are awesome! Defdinitely worth the price. I'm in love ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cookware
customer_reviews.text: I like this set very much with such a nice looking. These pans and pots are a solid set made of thick and heavy material. The handles are very comfortable to use and the silicone makes it easy to pick up. I also love the design of double-riveted contoured connection. The surface is very shining and looks quite elegant. They are so easy to clean. Really saves clean up time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure how I feel about these
customer_reviews.text: Not dishwasher safe, and either it scratches even with silicone or one pan arrived a little scratched. Not sure which. They are good to cook with and heat up quickly, but I’m a little afraid of potential damage, so we’ll see how it goes, as I’ve only had them a few weeks. I do love the color, though, so I’m hoping it’s just the one small frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: Siagao

customer_reviews.title: A great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: What an attractive set of pans! Got these to match new kitchen decor, and not only are they the perfect color they are great quality too. I had a similar set by Rachael Ray that were crap. These are better quality and cheaper! The silicone handles are a nice touch, and they give the pans a high-end feel. The fact that the handles are riveted to the pots/pans is super nice. Overall these are great. Nothing sticks :)
customer_reviews.author: aggie4life

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was way better than even fair
customer_reviews.text: The smallest pot had a small chip on it and I'll assume it was in shipping, Though the pots are shipped very precisely in cardboard, I contacted the seller for a replacement. They instead refunded me an amount for my purchase. I thought this was way better than even fair. They are beautiful and very sturdy, enamel cookware. The color is absolutely beautiful and great for a coastal kitchen! The extra tools was a plus since I have aluminum tools and they would damage the cookware. I'm very happy with my purchase and the response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M. Salaki

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful red cookware. Good quality for the price. Just follow the instructions - like don't crank it up to High right off... take care of them...no metal utensils, etc I say this cookware is good for 2 people b/c some of the pots are smaller than normal size - which was what I was looking for. wash, dry and oil slightly for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy with a decent non-stick coat and very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy with a decent non-stick coat and very easy to clean. I use these for every cooking and the color looks nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with these pots and pans. The non stick is so nice. The are a lot smaller than I expected, so I had to keep a few pieces from my old set, but so far I am satisfied with their quality. Update: I have now had these for a year and I still love them! They are a little discolored on the bottom but that doesn’t bother me at all. The nonstick works great and they clean up so easy!!! Love these post and pans. And the size doesn’t bother me anymore! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried when I read reviews that these pans were small, but they’re perfect for our family of 5! Super easy to clean and cook with.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and they’re great to cook on. Don’t cook at a super high heat and you should be alright. People expect too much from reasonably priced products. I’m a chef and think these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Anomal

customer_reviews.title: love them

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware EVER!

customer_reviews.title: It’s colorful, functional, and easy to work with but reading the instructions is important.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has been cooking with this cookware for a while. It comes with instructions regarding the maximum heat that should be used with it & how best to clean the cookware. It’s been easy to follow. In regards to the cooking aspect. It does take a few moments to heat up as a cast iron would, however, once heated up it maintains heat well and cooks evenly. Haven’t really placed cookware in oven. That has more to do with the cuisine rather than the cookware.

product_meta.title: Finnhomy Hard Porcelain Enamel Aluminum Cookware Set, Ceramic Cookware Set, New Technology Double Nonstick Coating Kitchen Pots and Pan Set, 14-Piece, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueFinnhomy Hard Porcelain Enamel Aluminum Cookware Set, Ceramic Cookware Set, New Technology Double Nonstick Coating Kitchen Pots and Pan Set, 14-Piece, Agave Blue. Including two covered saucepans (1-qt/ 2-qt), one 6-qt covered stockpot, two fry pan (8-in/9.5-in), and one 2.75-qt covered saute pan. Along with the nonstick pots and pans, it also includes 4 pcs slotted turner and spoons
feature_bullets: FAST & EVEN HEATING - Colorful porcelain enamel Aluminum cookware sets provides fast, even heating. A clear coating on the surface makes this cookware easy to clean.

DOUBLE LAYER NONSTICK COATING - New generation double non-stick multi coating layers technology ( imitation of lotus leaf ) offers non-stick cooking experience and easy clean up. Long-lasting, anti abrasion and anti scratch coating layer ensures safety and healthy.

HIGH HEAT AVAILABLE - Safe for all cooking methods except induction. Cooking surface able to reach 500 Degree F (high heat available); oven safe to 350 Degree F; High quality aluminum base provides even heat distribution.

SUPER VALUABLE SET - The cookware set includes two covered saucepans (1-qt/ 2-qt), one 6-qt covered stockpot, two fry pan (8-in/9.5-in), and one 2.75-qt covered saute pan. Along with the nonstick pots and pans, it also includes 4 pcs slotted turner and spoons, increased your buying value.

HEAT INSULATION HANDLE - Stay-cool design soft silicone handles which used double-riveted contoured connection to keep handles sturdy and cool. Tempered glass lids keep the cookware visible while cooking.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars215 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
